# The Content OS — thecontentos.ai
> The Content Operating System — frameworks and tools for content-driven growth. Platform playbooks, voice engineering, anti-slop methodology, and recursive content workflows.

## About
- Author: Shawn Tenam
- Part of the ShawnOS network (shawnos.ai, thegtmos.ai, thecontentos.ai)
- Architecture: Next.js app in a shared monorepo

## Content Types
- Content Wiki: /content-wiki — Platform playbooks, voice systems, tools, and workflows
- How-To Wiki: /how-to — Content engineering guides (cross-linked from shawnos.ai)

## Feeds
- RSS: /feed.xml, /feed/content-wiki.xml

## Key Topics
- Platform-specific content strategy (X, LinkedIn, Substack)
- Voice engineering and anti-slop methodology
- Content automation and MCP integrations
- Recursive content workflows
- AI-assisted content creation
